website_summaries.verdict: The best mask to clean and shrink large, clogged pores.
pros: Utilizes 3 types of clay and Yuzu lemon to smooth uneven skin
Draws dirt and oil out of pores
Visible pore reduction with continued use
Leaves skin feeling clean and soft
cons: Strong scent may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Like the exfoliation of it but as a mask didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. Like the exfoliation of it but as a mask didn’t notice much of a difference. Packaging is extremely deceptive and much less product then it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware it’s a horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. It makes my whole face ache the first times I used it. I’m not allergic to anything but for some reason this made my face turn red. The product itself heard and feels like sandpaper rubbing against my skin when I try to take it off. Horrible! Smell isn’t that great either.
customer_reviews.author: Ya boi nay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my combination skin
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! I have combination skin and acne but this mask really cooled my face and made it so soft! I had kept it on longer than the recommended 10 mins because I was doing chores and lost track of time but still worker great. I think this will be my new mask for life!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki818

customer_reviews.title: Came Damaged and Looks Used
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to try this product as its quality seems to have great reviews. However, when it arrived, the package was opened and it looked almost as if someone had taken a "scoop" of the mask already. I do not know what happened before shipping it to me, but the box was open and it looked already used. Very disappointing, as I have heard great things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mask I have used in a while & it has worked wonders without drying out my skin at all which is something a lot of masks similar to this product seem to do. The sent is pretty strong so that is one thing to be mindful of but overall, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I loved the other masks by L'Oreal but this one fell short. It left a film when I was removing it and applied unevenly as well when using an applicator brush. Try the other ones as they are better!
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: This smells so great and citrus like. I LOVE IT. It works perfectly for making you face clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face mask, it leaves your skin smooth and glowy.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Llamas

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: My face feels a little bit softer. Feel really nice. I would have to be consistent and use it more to see actual results but overall it is a nice mask.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's good! Not sure if its good for sensitive skin. I've been getting some break outs after using it, not sure if its my skin purging or if its being caused by the face mask
customer_reviews.author: evelyn p

customer_reviews.title: Helped my skin.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help as much as expected, but it did help some.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks better after the first use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not had a good cleansing mask in a while. This one makes difference. My skin looked more even and clean after the first use. I ordered other types of this mask as well, can’t wait to try them!
customer_reviews.author: Evgenia Kaneva

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not good. This stuff just leaves a film over your face instead of actually exfoliating and make soft, supple and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: It leaves a film almost, it’s hard to explain. Unlike other masks I’ve used. But I do think it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hard to come off!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions but had a very hard time removing the product off my face. There was an oily residue from the clay that stuck o my face. Had to double cleanse with other products to remove it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Farruh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good product however it leaves a residue behind
customer_reviews.author: Murjani

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I had rough bumpy skin on my forehead mostly and I swear I used it for 2 weeks, approximately twice a week, and I was clear! Even after the first use, I noticed a difference. Seriously love.
customer_reviews.author: Gab drazek

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: It did an amazing job of cleaning and brightening my face. Great find
customer_reviews.author: Tearel

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to refine skin texture
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mask. Use it 3x a week, and can see a difference in the texture, softness and moisture level of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY JONES

customer_reviews.title: What a difference
customer_reviews.text: After using this mask just a couple of times I can see and more importantly feel how much smoother my skin has become. It is a little more abrasive than the mask I had been using but in no way has it irritated my face.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Does leave your skin smooth but...
customer_reviews.text: A good mask, does leave your face smooth. But, I have sensitive skin and made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Marcosssszzzz

customer_reviews.title: Received used product
customer_reviews.text: I received used product which is completely unsanitary and I would be careful purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: This mask makes my face so smooth after I use it. The smell is awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this mask. It smells great and has a gentle exfoliant. I use this in combination with the charcoal mask and the red algae.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love how smooth my face feels after using it, not try, smells good
customer_reviews.author: Ilona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I always love these products, some of the best face masks on the market for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Baileygirl41

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's true. I can feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Lots of products make claims but this one wasn't joking. My skin is splotchy with some acne breakouts on occasion. This masks works pretty much exactly as described: slight difference with first use, noticeable difference with regular use. Smells good, but not overwhelming. Small jar, but it's not for everyday use so lasts just fine in my opinion. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Makaya

customer_reviews.title: I love products that do double duty!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way clay face masks draw out impurities and this is no exception. But what makes this unique however, is the fact that it's got a granular texture to help get the dead skin off, which in turn makes this by far the easiest if all to remove. The one thing I did find bothersome is that they sent me a totally crushed box. This was supposed to be put in with my daughters bday gifts and I had to remove it from the box before giving it to her.
customer_reviews.author: K2G2

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Skin Feel Refreshed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving myself a facial mask weekly since I had my skin analysed on my last cruise. To keep my skins moist and supple I have a routine that was designed for me to use. This clay mask is best because it is not drying. My skin consultant told me to stay away from the charcoal masks and I will!
customer_reviews.author: Messy728

customer_reviews.title: Excellent facemask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask so much! I use it about 3-4 times a week just before I shower. It smells ok. Not good or bad. It exfoliates really nicely and not too harshly but also but too gently. After I use it my face is so soft and glowy. I have sensitive skin and it hasn't caused any rash or breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Potter

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on time, not my fave product in the line
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, arrived in timely manner. It is not as good as the black clay, purifying mask, though this is a scrub mask. Not a fan of this particular mask/scrub by L'oreal. The orange clay scrub mask is better than this one. Peter Thomas Roth (from Sephora or Ulta direct, not on Amazon) Pumpkin Enzyme Mask is really what you need in a scrub mask, but these L'oreal masks are way gentle.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy: White residue on skin after washing
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing this through amazon and not sure why this is leaving a white oily residue after washing. I never had this experience with previous L’Oréal masks that I purchase elsewhere, not sure if it’s a new formula.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Great and inexpensive mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clay mask. My skin is oily and has tendency to acne. It doesn’t break out. And clarifies the skin giving smooth and bright I wear this mask for a long time
customer_reviews.author: gabriela queiroz

customer_reviews.title: perfection
customer_reviews.text: Lately I have been having issues with my combination skin. My dry spots were becoming more noticeable leaving me insecure about my face. I got a free sample of this product and that is ultimately what led me to buy it. I use this 3 times a week and my face has never felt more smooth and radiant.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: In love. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted with this product. It works as wonders. Big wonder in a small package. Exfoliates perfectly and works amazing as after sun tan. I have maybe used the whole year been buying many. Already hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Shama414

customer_reviews.title: Great treatment
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask. I use it once a week and not only does it do a great job of cleaning my face it's super refreshing and makes my face very soft after use. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian&Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: This product I love the scrub and the fact that it evens my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny T

customer_reviews.title: I no longer use it
customer_reviews.text: I got the yellow scrub. Works well to brighten my complexion but made me break out in small pimples. I no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: A and K

customer_reviews.title: Good results to good cost!
customer_reviews.text: I liked of this mask, the exfoliation was good and the sensation after to clear was aligned! Also for the price is a good option! 😀
customer_reviews.author: ANAHIZ FUENTES

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Grainy, smells okay but no wow factor. Not impressed in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M.

customer_reviews.title: but I like it so
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it once, but I like it so far
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and real results
customer_reviews.text: Highly effective in just 10 mins! Not harsh on skin like other masks I’ve tried. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amelie100

product_meta.title: Clay Facial Mask, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Pure Clay Face Mask with Yuzu Lemon for Rough Skin to Clarify & Smooth, at home face mask, 1.7 oz.
product_meta.description: Style Name:Clarify & SmoothFor best skincare results use Pure Clay face mask 3 times per week leaving on for 10 to 15 minutes per use
feature_bullets: Face mask with 3 Pure Clays and Yuzu Lemon is best for rough skin to clarify and smooth for immediate at home results.
Pure Clay face mask is formulated to provide a luxurious skincare experience while potent pure clays and yuzu lemon clarify uneven skin tone and smooth rough skin
Immediately face mask leaves skin with a clean glow, dirt, dust and oil are effectively lifted from skin, roughness feels smoother and skin complexion appears fresher
Use after use of this face mask skin surface appears renewed and refined, imperfections appear reduced and skin looks more even, healthy and beautiful
For best skincare results use Pure Clay face mask 3 times per week leaving on for 10 to 15 minutes per use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
